title: Mood Food Energy Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Western-style health food restaurant. Offers a large menu of juices, smoothies, and lassi; has wheatgrass and also Chinese tea. Comfortable atmosphere with different seating areas, Wi-Fi access. Hosts daily yoga, qi gong, and meditation.
